HtmlBody:
Hi Mini,

From the records I have in this workspace, you've sent 4 emails to us before this one. Including today's message, that makes 5.

If you want a specific date range or a different account, tell me and I'll double-check.

Best,
Oliver
Subject: Re: Hi
